amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to employ those who are not legally authorized to work.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds be used in contravention of section 402(e)(1) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mrs. Capito.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Capito amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
